Bases: deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.curvature_blocks.CurvatureBlock

A scale and shift block with a diagonal approximation to the curvature.

init(rng: jax._src.numpy.lax_numpy.ndarray) → Dict[str, Any][source]

This initializes/creates all of the arrays for the state of the block.

Usually this would include the arrays used for storing the curvature approximation, as well as the arrays for storing any approximate inverses/powers of the curvature block.

Parameters

  • rng – The Jax PRNG key to use if any of the state is supposed to be

  • randomly. (initialized) –

Returns

A mutable mapping of the state.
